channel.title: Lag help
channel.description:
right there probly isnt a cure for this but, at bout 25+ players on my serv it starts to lag, i dont want ham (my dad dosent trust with virus rumors and being unsafe etc)
is there a way to stop/reduce or is it just what my pc can handle?

item.title: Lag help
item.dc:creator: @pkaz_0wnt pkaz 0wnt
item.description:
@pkaz_0wnt wrote:

ok ty, i tried silabsoft’s tut on nulls it worked 4 a while but i started getting again lol? that might have been my old serv, not sure cant remember lol nd ty evrey one especially click whos helped me many times lol

and nulls dont count as players do they?

Read full topic

item.title: Lag help
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

[quote=“pkaz 0wnt, post:6, topic:72151”][quote author=Click Here link=topic=105995.msg1063064#msg1063064 date=1175203867]
yeah go into client.java and then search max players and then change the max players
[/quote]

would this be right (its in playerhandler.java)

public static final int maxPlayers = 24;[/quote] yes that is it, then just save compile and then run

Read full topic

item.title: Lag help
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

OR you got too many nulls try silabsoft’s guide i did it on noob source and could handle 15people NOT EVEN ONE null!

Read full topic

yeah go into client.java and then search max players and then change the max players

item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

[quote=“pkaz 0wnt, post:4, topic:72151”]hmm would that log me off and not let back in?[/quote]No, that would just set limits on how many people could go on the server at the same time (i heard that if it maxs out then the server crashs or somthing)
